item.title: CVE-2024-2580|2024-03-21T16:48:23.199Z -- FunnelKit -- Automation By Autonami
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in FunnelKit Automation By Autonami allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Automation By Autonami: from n/a through 2.8.2.
